name: Delirious (Loredana.Arts)
description:
A Game made by group Six during the minor Interactive Narrative Design.
A 2 month project with a demo game as ending. 

Made by:
Lars Gobbens
Susanne van Opstal
Roxie Folkers
Sanne Ruhé 

Walk with your arrows and point an click for discoveries. 
Enjoy the play (:
